= Introduction =

NaiNo-Kami (NNK) is a suite of Matlab and Perl scripts for earthquake waveform clustering from cross-correlation. Seismological exploitations modules are included for 1D and 3D location, 1D and 3D double difference relocation, focal mechanism determination, coda wave interferometry and more to come.
